node.title: Man charged over attack on bystander who intervened in domestic violence assault
node.alt: The outside of a Bunnings store in Darwin.
node.description: Police have charged a man, and are searching for another, allegedly involved in an assault on a good Samaritan who tried to stop an attack on a woman.
node.content: ["Northern Territory police have charged a\u00a0man\u00a0over an attack that left a bystander who tried to intervene in a domestic violence incident\u00a0in hospital.", "At about 3pm on Wednesday, police responded to reports of an assault in\u00a0the car park of Bunnings on Bagot Road, Darwin, where a\u00a043-year-old man had allegedly been pushed to the ground and\u00a0kicked in the head after trying\u00a0to stop another man attacking a woman.\u00a0", "Police say the man was taken to the\u00a0Royal Darwin Hospital in a stable condition and has since been discharged.", "\u201cThe victim has attempted to intervene in what appears to be a domestic violence incident and he was himself assaulted,\"\u00a0Detective Senior Sergeant Michael Budge said.\u00a0", "A 54-year-old man\u00a0was arrested at the scene and taken to the Palmerston Watch House.", "He will face court today charged with two counts of aggravated assault and recklessly endangering serious harm.\u00a0", "Senior Sergeant\u00a0Budge said a 29-year-old allegedly involved in the assault had\u00a0not yet been found.\u00a0", "Police are urging witnesses to come forward with any information about the incident.\u00a0", "The condition of the woman involved in the domestic violence incident is not known.\u00a0"]
